channel.title: Pst on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Pst on TLDRBins

item.title: Microsoft Oulook Email Folder
item.description: Open Email File .pst .msg Tools sudo apt install pst-utils General # Convert to mbox format readpst '<PST_FILE>' $ readpst 'Access Control.pst' Opening PST file and indexes... Processing Folder "Deleted Items" "Access Control" - 2 items done, 0 items skipped. # Open .mbox (plaintext) cat '<MBOX_FILE>' $ cat 'Access Control.mbox' From "john@megacorp.com" Fri Aug 24 07:44:07 2018 Status: RO From: john@megacorp.com <john@megacorp.com> Subject: MegaCorp Access Control System "security" account To: 'security@accesscontrolsystems.
